title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Social Collaboration-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, probability, statistics) and professional practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively solve complex math problems (e.g., probability modeling) in VR environments
Learners experience cross-professional knowledge integration via activity theory-based tools and derive creative solutions through social interaction
Learners improve problem-solving strategies by incorporating real-time feedback through formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
